note.p: Career: Traded to South America, from Newgate Street, London; MP for Westbury (1808-1812); visited Spain (1809-1810); Alderman for Lime Street (1810); Comptroller of Corn returns to the Board of Trade (1822); retired on a pension (1842); wrote works on Corn Laws, corn trade and precious metals
Notes: DNB gives death date as 15 December 1851
